job.title: Machine Learning Graphics Engineer
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brApple is seeking a ML Graphics Engineer who is exceptionally creative and innovative to join a team of industryleading developers in their pursuit of innovative algorithms for 3D human visualization Design and implement ML graphics workflows and procedural systems while working closely with a small team in a collaborative nature Be forwardthinking in a fast paced startup environment with a drive to enable a team to scale productively and efficiently The individual should be able to collaborate with multifunctional teams to develop algorithms and generate data to build software solutions for Apples next generation productsbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExcellent programming skills in Python andor CC in a Linuxand or MacOS environmentbrbrbrSolid foundation in 3D geometry data structures and algorithms and linear algebrabrbrbrExtensive knowledge of general computer vision and deep learningbrbrbrSolid understanding and experience of deep generative modelsbrbrbrUnderstanding of physicsbased simulation methodsbrbrbrExcellent problem solving critical thinking and communication skillsbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brApple makes the newest technologies accessible to create amazing user experiences You will have the opportunity to work in a multifunctional team to develop tools and algorithms for human visualization You will need a keen understanding and deep experience in 3D human development  photogrammetry shading rigging simulation ML and pipelines Your work will help synthetic human generation and the data will be essential to build advanced software solutionsbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brPhD in Computer Science Machine learning Computer Vision or related field or MS in related fieldbrbr brRole Number 200272245brbr
